Mailing Address: c/o Administration Office1434 Graham StKelowna, BC     V1Y 3A8
Service Details: - Offers a purpose driven drop-in program for youth in a safe, supportive environment, provides basic needs, recreational activities and opportunities, life-skills training and appropriate referrals to other youth services- Designed for youth ages 12-19 to come to the Centre and visit with friends, take part in activities such as pool, board games, crafts, Nintendo Wii, Netflix, listen to music, Wi-Fi access and fun filled out-trips- While accessing the drop-in program youth can have access to free food- The drop-in is also free and accessible to all interested youth in the community regardless of background
How to Apply: Please call our office for additional information
